title: Personal Credit
text: This course is designed to teach individuals how to repair and build their personal credit. It covers a range of topics related to personal credit, including understanding credit reports and scores, disputing errors on credit reports, managing debt and establishing good credit habits.Upon completion, you will have a deeper understanding of the credit system and the steps the
